languages.text: {n}Друкари замирает, в его глазах — изумление и горькое разочарование. Мгновение спустя он без всяких усилий вырывает запястье из вашей хватки и поднимается, пряча клинок и цедя сквозь зубы непереводимые ксеносские ругательства.{/n}

{n}Marazhai freezes, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he effortlessly pulls his wrist free of your grip and stands, sheathing his blade and muttering untranslatable xenos profanity through gritted teeth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари замирает, в его глазах — изумление и горькое разочарование. Мгновение спустя он без всяких усилий вырывает запястье из вашей хватки и поднимается, пряча клинок и цедя сквозь зубы непереводимые ксеносские ругательства.{/n}

{n}Marazhai freezes, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he effortlessly pulls his wrist free of your grip and stands, sheathing his blade and muttering untranslatable xenos profanity through gritted teeth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋愣住了，眼神中流露着震惊与无比苦涩的失望。片刻之后，他毫不费力地挣脱了你的钳制。他站起身来，将刀收回了刀鞘中，口中咬牙切齿地吐出了一连串无法翻译的异形脏话。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he effortlessly pulls his wrist free of your grip and stands, sheathing his blade and muttering untranslatable xenos profanity through gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋愣住了，眼神中流露着震惊与无比苦涩的失望。片刻之后，他毫不费力地挣脱了你的钳制。他站起身来，将刀收回了刀鞘中，口中咬牙切齿地吐出了一连串无法翻译的异形脏话。{/n}

languages.text: {n}固まったマラズハイの目にはショックと激しい失望の色が滲んでいる。次の瞬間、彼は軽々とあなたに掴まれた手首を拘束から解いた。それから立ち上がって刃を鞘に収め、歯を食いしばりながら翻訳できない異種族の暴言をつぶやいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he effortlessly pulls his wrist free of your grip and stands, sheathing his blade and muttering untranslatable xenos profanity through gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}固まったマラズハイの目にはショックと激しい失望の色が滲んでいる。次の瞬間、彼は軽々とあなたに掴まれた手首を拘束から解いた。それから立ち上がって刃を鞘に収め、歯を食いしばりながら翻訳できない異種族の暴言をつぶやいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se queda muy quieto, con una expresión que destila sorpresa y la más amarga decepción. Luego se zafa de tu presa sin ningún esfuerzo y se pone en pie, envainando su puñal y mascullando una sarta de intraducibles improperios xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he effortlessly pulls his wrist free of your grip and stands, sheathing his blade and muttering untranslatable xenos profanity through gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se queda muy quieto, con una expresión que destila sorpresa y la más amarga decepción. Luego se zafa de tu presa sin ningún esfuerzo y se pone en pie, envainando su puñal y mascullando una sarta de intraducibles improperios xenos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'immobilise, le regard empreint de stupéfaction et de déception mêlées. Un instant plus tard, il dégage sans effort son poignet de votre étreinte et se redresse, rengainant sa lame tout en marmonnant un chapelet d'injures xénos intraduisibles entre ses dents serrées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he effortlessly pulls his wrist free of your grip and stands, sheathing his blade and muttering untranslatable xenos profanity through gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai s'immobilise, le regard empreint de stupéfaction et de déception mêlées. Un instant plus tard, il dégage sans effort son poignet de votre étreinte et se redresse, rengainant sa lame tout en marmonnant un chapelet d'injures xénos intraduisibles entre ses dents serrées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai erstarrt und seine Augen strahlen Schock und bitterste Enttäuschung aus. Einen Augenblick später löst er mühelos sein Handgelenk aus deinem Griff und erhebt sich, zieht seine Klinge und murmelt durch zusammengebissene Zähnen unübersetzbare Xenos-Schimpfwörter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he effortlessly pulls his wrist free of your grip and stands, sheathing his blade and muttering untranslatable xenos profanity through gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai erstarrt und seine Augen strahlen Schock und bitterste Enttäuschung aus. Einen Augenblick später löst er mühelos sein Handgelenk aus deinem Griff und erhebt sich, zieht seine Klinge und murmelt durch zusammengebissene Zähnen unübersetzbare Xenos-Schimpfwörter.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai donakalıyor. Gözlerinden şaşkınlık ve şiddetli hayal kırıklığı yayılıyor. Bir süre sonra hiç zorlanmadan bileğini elinden kurtarıyor. İstemeye istemeye bıçağını çekerek tercümesi imkânsız zeno küfürleri mırıldanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes, his eyes radiating shock and bitterest disappointment. A moment later, he effortlessly pulls his wrist free of your grip and stands, sheathing his blade and muttering untranslatable xenos profanity through gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai donakalıyor. Gözlerinden şaşkınlık ve şiddetli hayal kırıklığı yayılıyor. Bir süre sonra hiç zorlanmadan bileğini elinden kurtarıyor. İstemeye istemeye bıçağını çekerek tercümesi imkânsız zeno küfürleri mırıldanıyor.{/n}
